Package com.paydiant.android.bluetooth.ble

Provides set of classes to support Bluetooth Low Energy(BLE) operations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBLEServiceProvider
    Defines the set of operations currently supported by the BLE Service Provider implementations.
    IBLEServiceProviderListener
    Defines the list of callbacks that gets invoked during the operations of IBLEServiceProvider implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BLECharacteristic
    Provides attributes of a Bluetooth Gatt Charateristic item.
    BLEDevice
    Provides attributes of a Bluetooth Device.
    BLEScanRecord
    Utility class that holds and decodes the advertisement data and scan responses.
    BLEScanRecord.AdData
    Class representing an ad data structure.
    BLEService
    Provides attributes of a Bluetooth Gatt Service item.
    DefaultBLEServiceProvider
    Provides support to lookup default BLE Service provider, included with the Paydiant BLE library or to use a custom IBLEServiceProvider implementation as the default BLE service provider.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BLEException
    This class encapsulate exceptions thrown during the BLE operations such as scanning, connecting, reading data etc.
    BLEServiceProviderException
    Represents exceptions that occurred during initialization & operations of BLE Service Providers.

Package com.paydiant.android.bluetooth.ble Description

Provides set of classes to support Bluetooth Low Energy(BLE) operations.
Since:
4.9.0.1
